biography: Kristian, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a wealth of experience to the greens. Representing Master Golf Club, Kristian is known for his calm demeanor and strategic approach to the game. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his consistent performance makes him a respected competitor.
Kristian has participated in 3 past Hector Trophée events and while he won't be playing in 2025, he remains an active and engaged member of the Hector community.

Off the course, Kristian is known for his dedication to junior golf programs, often volunteering his time to mentor young players. His commitment to the sport extends beyond personal achievement, as he strives to foster a love for the game in future generations.
